Class TeacherDatabase

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.Database<Teacher>
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Personnel.TeacherDatabase
public class TeacherDatabase extends Database<Teacher>
Database for storing and accessing teacher entity
Author:
Cheugn Tuen King

    • validateTeacherLogin

      public void validateTeacherLogin(String username, String pwd)
      Validate the username and password for teacher login
      Parameters:
      username - Username for login
      pwd - Password for login
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Username does not exist, or password incorrect

    • registerTeacher

      public void registerTeacher(Teacher teacher)
      Register the validated teacher entity
      Parameters:
      teacher - Teacher for registration

    • validatePassword

      public static void validatePassword(String pwd)
      Validate the password given. Password should:
    • have length in range (0, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_PASSWORD_LENGTH_LIMIT)
    • contain no blank space
    • have at least 1 capital letter
    • have at least 1 small letter
    • have at least 1 number
    • have at least 1 special character "!@$%^invalid input: '&'*_+invalid input: '<'>/-"
      • Parameters:
      pwd - Teacher name
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Any above condition is not met

    • containAny

      private static boolean containAny(String input, String check)
      Check if input string contain at least one of the characters in check string
      Parameters:
      input - Input string for checking
      check - List of target characters
      Returns:
      Boolean determining if the input string contain any check string characters

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll()
      Delete all teachers in the database. For testing only
